Nominee.definition: a person named as the recipient of a grant

1.definition: a person named as the recipient of a grant, conveyance, or annuity

2.definition: a person named or proposed for an office, duty, or position

sub_terms.a: a person named to act as another's agent or representative
sub_terms.b: a candidate selected to represent a party in an election

3.definition: a person in whose name a stock or registered bond certificate is registered but who is not the actual owner
